thread.title: MusicNews | Rihanna FINALLY unveils artwork and title for eighth album
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Rihanna FINALLY unveils artwork and title for eighth album - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: MusicNews | Rihanna FINALLY unveils artwork and title for eighth album
text:
Rihanna, who we're used to pumping out albums on an annual basis, is long overdue with her eighth studio album but it looks like it could be coming any day now as last night she unveiled the album title and artwork at an event in Los Angeles last night.
Set up in the MAMA Gallery, Rihanna displayed the album cover, created by artist Roy Nachum, and revealed that it will be called 'ANTI'. Why? Well we'll let her tell you that (via art).
Tonight @rihanna unleashed the artwork for her upcoming album ANTI. #ANTIR8 pic.twitter.com/0TK99uC2xL
— Roc Nation (@RocNation) October 8, 2015
Rih says this is her favorite album she's ever done #r8 pic.twitter.com/r2hiwszHOy
— ™ (@Dragging1D) October 8, 2015 Front and back album artwork for @rihanna 's 8th studio album. #R8 pic.twitter.com/zsiYHZyWOF
— The FADER (@thefader) October 8, 2015 There are Braille translations of the interior artwork for @rihanna 's 8th studio album packaging #R8 pic.twitter.com/mX7Rdgru2D
— The FADER (@thefader) October 8, 2015 pic.twitter.com/EgEoTUD4Od
— The FADER (@thefader) October 8, 2015 The title of @rihanna 's 8th studio album is "Anti" pic.twitter.com/RTjeclX5PN
— The FADER (@thefader) October 8, 2015
Unfortunately we're still without a release date but fingers crossed she does a Beyoncé and drops it on us before Christmas at least. But if there's a now option, we'll take that too.
Via Pitchfork
